channel.title: Irc on icyphox
channel.description: Recent content in Irc on icyphox

item.title: IRC Etiquette
item.description: It took a good week and a little bit more for this post. I was busy ricing my box again (here), and preparing for my switch to 2bwm. You see, I realized that I’ve been floating my windows an unhealthy amount, in a tiling window manager - i3. Anyway, IRC (Internet Relay Chat). It’s been around for years, and you can chat in real-time with people from all around the world, in channels.
